00217 
00218 inline int 
00219 MultiFileDBufRequesterIndexHandler::getIndexNbr( 
00220                      int fileNbr, const MC2SimpleString& desc ) const
00221 {
00222    uint32 hash = 0;
00223    int len = desc.length();
00224    for ( int i = 0; i < len; ++i ) {
00225       hash = (hash >> 28) | (hash << 4);
00226       hash ^= desc[i];
00227    }
00228    hash %= m_nbrHash;
00229    return fileNbr * m_nbrHash + hash;
00230 }
